subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Rod Beck was a colorful baseball personality and a three-time All-Star. He spent the first 7 of his 13 major league seasons with the San Francisco Giants.
snippet: Rod Beck was a colorful baseball personality and a three-time All-Star. He spent the first 7 of his 13 major league seasons with the San Francisco Giants.
